mapper.select: SELECT R_CATE_BCODE, CATE_NAME, R_CATE_CODE FROM R_CATE WHERE R_CATE_BCODE = #{r_cate_bcode} AND R_CATE_MCODE IS NULL
SELECT * FROM VIEW_MYRENT WHERE R_POST_CODE = (SELECT R_POST_CODE FROM R_APPLY WHERE B_USER_CODE = #{b_user_code})

SELECT DISTINCT RP.TITLE , J.NICKNAME, FIRST_VALUE(PT.PHOTO) OVER (PARTITION BY PT.R_POST_CODE ORDER BY PT.R_PHOTO_CODE)AS PHOTO, RP.OFFER_LOC AS OFFERLOC, RP.COLLECT_LOC AS COLLECTLOC, RP.COST , RP.B_USER_CODE FROM R_POST RP LEFT JOIN JOIN J ON RP.B_USER_CODE = J.B_USER_CODE LEFT JOIN R_PHOTO PT ON RP.R_POST_CODE = PT.R_POST_CODE WHERE R_CATE_CODE IN (SELECT R_CATE_CODE FROM R_CATE WHERE R_CATE_BCODE = (SELECT R_CATE_CODE FROM R_CATE_INPUT WHERE B_USER_CODE = #{b_user_code} ) AND R_CATE_MCODE IS NOT NULL ) AND RP.B_USER_CODE != #{b_user_code}

SELECT LOC_NAME AS LOCNAME1, (SELECT L.LOC_NAME FROM R_POST R LEFT JOIN LOC L ON R.LOC_CODE = L.LOC_CODE WHERE R_POST_CODE = #{r_post_code}) AS LOCNAME2 FROM LOC WHERE LOC_CODE = (SELECT LOC_BCODE FROM LOC WHERE LOC_CODE = (SELECT LOC_CODE FROM R_POST WHERE R_POST_CODE = #{r_post_code}))

SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.START_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD')+LEVEL-1,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS SUCCESS_DATE FROM R_SUCCESS S LEFT JOIN R_APPLY A ON S.R_APPLY_CODE = A.R_APPLY_CODE WHERE A.R_POST_CODE = #{r_post_code} CONNECT BY LEVEL <=(TO_DATE(A.END_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD')-TO_DATE(A.START_DATE,'YY-MM-DD')+2)
